list.name: Changes
list.comment: Add support for typed variable declarations with `let`, update parser to handle type annotations, and extend lexer and AST for `:` token and `LET` keyword.

task.summary: Default task

changelist.name: Changes
changelist.comment: Delete everything! This is a hard reset!

task.summary: Reset `Main`: add `foldDoubleQuotes` for `"` handling, update `foldDecorated` to unify quoting logic, and refine `Main.java` and `Main.c` loop handling.
Reset `Main`: add `compileNot` for "!" handling, integrate into `compileExpr` in `Main.java` and `Main.c`, and refine related logic.
Reset `Main`: add `compileChar` for `'` handling, refine `compileExpr` in `Main.java` and `Main.c`, and fix syntax consistency.
Reset `Main`: extract `compileFunctionStatement`, refine segment compilation in `Main.java` and `Main.c`, and improve syntax consistency.
Reset `Main`: add `>` operator handling in `compileOperator`, improve syntax consistency across `Main.java` and `Main.c`.
Reset `Main`: add `!=`, `&&`, and `||` operator handling in `compileOperator`, refine syntax consistency across `Main.java` and `Main.c`.
Reset `Main`: add `peek` method for state peeking, refine lambda compilation with fallback parameters, and enhance operator handling for syntax consistency in `Main.java` and `Main.c`.
Reset `Main`: refine value compilation for state handling, enhance lambda composition, and unify syntax consistency across `Main.java` and `Main.c`.
Reset `Main`: refine value and lambda compilation logic, enhance fallback handling, and unify function assembly syntax in `Main.java` and `Main.c`.
FULL BUILD: Reset `Main`: add `foldEscapeChar` for escape handling, extend class and interface compilation, and enhance syntax consistency across `Main.java` and `Main.c`.
Reset `Main`: extract `tryAdvanceAtOperator` from `foldOperator`, refine operator state handling, and unify syntax consistency across `Main.java` and `Main.c`.
Reset `Main`: add `hasNextChar` method, refine operator folding logic, and improve syntax consistency in `Main.java`.
Reset `Main`: add `record` type compilation, enhance `Result` structures with `match` method, and improve syntax consistency in `Main.java` and `Main.c`.
Reset `Main`: adjust `record` and `field` compilation order, refine type assembly logic, enhance `match` method support, and update workspace configuration.
Reset `Main`: add `typeparam` support in `match` methods, refine type assembly logic, and enhance syntax consistency in `Main.java` and `Main.c`.
Reset `Main`: enhance `typeparam` support, refine `match` methods, improve type safety, and update workspace configuration.
Reset `Main`: introduce `Definition` record for improved type and name handling, refine `parseDefinition` logic, and enhance syntax consistency in `Main.java`.

Reset `Main`: introduce `Definable` interface to unify `generate` logic, add `Placeholder` record, and replace `compileDefinitionOrPlaceholder` with `parseDefinitionOrPlaceholder` for enhanced flexibility and clarity.
Reset `Main`: refine `Definition` structure, enhance type parameter handling, align `generate` logic, and apply updates across `Main.java` and `Main.c`.
Reset `Main`: refine task summaries, update workspace configuration, improve `typeparam` handling, and fix minor formatting issues in `Main.java` and `Main.c`.
Reset `Main`: refine type handling in `compile*` methods, add `compileStructureType`, improve `isIdentifier` logic, and enhance syntax consistency in `Main.java` and `Main.c`.
Reset `Main`: refine `compileType` logic, introduce `compileTypeOrPlaceholder`, improve `isIdentifier` handling, enhance `Definition` extraction, and update syntax in `Main.java` and `Main.c`.
Reset `Main`: refine `Definition` parsing logic, improve `State` structure and helper methods, enhance type and parameter handling, and apply syntax updates in `Main.java` and `Main.c`.
Reset `Main`: refine `Definition` creation flow, enhance `compileType` logic, improve `typeparam` handling in `match` methods, and update syntax consistency in `Main.java` and `Main.c`.
Reset `Main`: extract `assembleDefinition` for reuse, refine `Definition` creation logic, and update syntax consistency in `Main.java` and `Main.c`.
Reset `Main`: replace `compileClass` with `compileStructure` for enhanced flexibility, introduce `getString` for type parameter handling, and update syntax consistency in `Main.java` and `Main.c`.
Reset `Main`: replace `getString` with `assembleStructure` for improved naming clarity, update references accordingly, and maintain syntax consistency in `Main.java`.
Reset `Main`: introduce `RESERVED_KEYWORDS`, refine `isIdentifier` logic, add constructor support in `parseDefinition`, and enhance `Main.java` and `Main.c` for improved structure handling.

Reset `Main`: extract `MethodHeader` interface, introduce `Constructor` record, refine `Definition` logic, enhance parameter parsing, and update `Main.java` and `Main.c` for improved structure and consistency.
Reset `Main`: enhance parameter parsing with `Parameter` interface, update `assembleFunction` and `generateFunction`, and refine structure and syntax in `Main.java` and `Main.c`.
Reset `Main`: introduce `void* __self__` for self-referencing in method signatures, update `Main.java` and `Main.c` for enhanced parameter handling, and maintain syntax consistency.

Reset `Main`: enhance `assembleFunction` to include `structName`, introduce `struct State this` for type-safety in `Main.c`, and update handling of self-referencing in method signatures across `Main.java` and `Main.c`.

Reset `Main`: Attach struct name to methods. Update `Parameter` and `MethodHeader` to `JavaParameter` and `JavaMethodHeader`, respectively; introduce `CDefinition` for C-specific behavior; enhance `assembleFunction` implementation; refine type-safety with `State` methods in `Main.c`; and maintain syntax consistency across `Main.java` and `Main.c`.

Reset `Main`: refine `compileValue` functions to include `structName`, ensure consistent parameter handling across `Main.java` and `Main.c`, and enhance `Main.c` type-safety with explicit `State` usage.
Reset `Main`: replace `Optional` with `Some` and `None` implementations, refine `compileValue` functions for clarity, and update `Main.java` and `Main.c` for consistency.
Reset `Main`: refine `Option` interface replacing `Optional`, update `State` methods for streamlined handling, and maintain consistency between `Main.java` and `Main.c`.
Reset `Main`: extract nested interfaces and classes to separate files, introduce `DivideState` for cleaner state management, and enhance modularity across `Main.java`.

Add comprehensive API documentation and developer guide for the `Magma` system, detailing core components, architecture, functional patterns, and usage examples. Include Javadoc for key interfaces and classes, enhancing code clarity and maintainability.
Update `README.md` and `docs/API.md`: Reframe `Magma` as a self-hosted Java-to-C compiler, clarify features, enhance examples, and update code sections for consistency with recent changes.
Add IntelliJ IDEA project configuration files to `.idea/` directory.
Add IntelliJ IDEA configuration files including `modules.xml` and `vcs.xml` for project setup.
Add initial implementation of the Magma compiler: include lexer, parser, AST classes, testing suite, build script, and example program.
Add debug tools and examples: `DebugParser`, `ParserTest`, `LexerTest`, and integer literal tests; update project configuration.
Initialize lexer tokenization in `MagmaParser` and adjust project configurations for improved testing and debugging.
Add `LexerDebug` and `LexerDebugSimple` for tokenization debugging, refine `MagmaLexer` number parsing, and extend lexer tests for EOF handling.
Introduce `ErrorState` class for managing compiler error states and refactor related logic across core components for improved error handling and immutability.
Document Magma compiler's C code generation target in `README.md` and update comments in `Magma.java` for clarity.
Add support for typed variable declarations with `let`, update parser to handle type annotations, and extend lexer and AST for `:` token and `LET` keyword.

MESSAGE.value: Reset `Main`: introduce `RESERVED_KEYWORDS`, refine `isIdentifier` logic, add constructor support in `parseDefinition`, and enhance `Main.java` and `Main.c` for improved structure handling.
Reset `Main`: introduce `Constructor`, refine `parseConstructor` logic, enhance `assembleFunction` handling of `MethodHeader`, and improve structure and syntax in `Main.java` and `Main.c`.

Reset `Main`: extract `MethodHeader` interface, introduce `Constructor` record, refine `Definition` logic, enhance parameter parsing, and update `Main.java` and `Main.c` for improved structure and consistency.
Reset `Main`: enhance parameter parsing with `Parameter` interface, update `assembleFunction` and `generateFunction`, and refine structure and syntax in `Main.java` and `Main.c`.
Reset `Main`: introduce `void* __self__` for self-referencing in method signatures, update `Main.java` and `Main.c` for enhanced parameter handling, and maintain syntax consistency.

Reset `Main`: enhance `assembleFunction` to include `structName`, introduce `struct State this` for type-safety in `Main.c`, and update handling of self-referencing in method signatures across `Main.java` and `Main.c`.

Reset `Main`: Attach struct name to methods. Update `Parameter` and `MethodHeader` to `JavaParameter` and `JavaMethodHeader`, respectively; introduce `CDefinition` for C-specific behavior; enhance `assembleFunction` implementation; refine type-safety with `State` methods in `Main.c`; and maintain syntax consistency across `Main.java` and `Main.c`.

Reset `Main`: refine `compileValue` functions to include `structName`, ensure consistent parameter handling across `Main.java` and `Main.c`, and enhance `Main.c` type-safety with explicit `State` usage.
Reset `Main`: replace `Optional` with `Some` and `None` implementations, refine `compileValue` functions for clarity, and update `Main.java` and `Main.c` for consistency.
Reset `Main`: refine `Option` interface replacing `Optional`, update `State` methods for streamlined handling, and maintain consistency between `Main.java` and `Main.c`.
Reset `Main`: extract nested interfaces and classes to separate files, introduce `DivideState` for cleaner state management, and enhance modularity across `Main.java`.
Refactor `Placeholder`: use static method reference for wrapping values.

Add comprehensive API documentation and developer guide for the `Magma` system, detailing core components, architecture, functional patterns, and usage examples. Include Javadoc for key interfaces and classes, enhancing code clarity and maintainability.
Update `README.md` and `docs/API.md`: Reframe `Magma` as a self-hosted Java-to-C compiler, clarify features, enhance examples, and update code sections for consistency with recent changes.
Add IntelliJ IDEA project configuration files to `.idea/` directory.
Add IntelliJ IDEA configuration files including `modules.xml` and `vcs.xml` for project setup.
Add initial implementation of the Magma compiler: include lexer, parser, AST classes, testing suite, build script, and example program.
Add debug tools and examples: `DebugParser`, `ParserTest`, `LexerTest`, and integer literal tests; update project configuration.
Initialize lexer tokenization in `MagmaParser` and adjust project configurations for improved testing and debugging.
Add `LexerDebug` and `LexerDebugSimple` for tokenization debugging, refine `MagmaLexer` number parsing, and extend lexer tests for EOF handling.
Introduce `ErrorState` class for managing compiler error states and refactor related logic across core components for improved error handling and immutability.
Document Magma compiler's C code generation target in `README.md` and update comments in `Magma.java` for clarity.
Add support for typed variable declarations with `let`, update parser to handle type annotations, and extend lexer and AST for `:` token and `LET` keyword.
